meanings.definition: A lamp that emits ultraviolet radiation to simulate sunlight.
meanings.sent1: I bought a new sunlamp for my plants to help them grow indoors.
meanings.sent2: The doctor recommended using a sunlamp to treat my seasonal affective disorder.
meanings.sent3: When the sunlamp turned on by itself, it looked like a tiny sun in my room!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright as a sunlamp, lighting up the whole room.
meanings.sent5: The sunlamp's warm glow made the chilly room feel cozy and inviting.

meanings.definition: To expose to the light of a sunlamp.
meanings.sent1: She decided to sunlamp her skin to get a tan before the beach trip.
meanings.sent2: The therapist recommended sunlamping for a few minutes each day to improve mood.
meanings.sent3: He accidentally sunlamped his book while trying to read under the bright light.
meanings.sent4: The artist sunlamped the painting to bring out the vibrant colors.
meanings.sent5: The flowers bloomed beautifully after being sunlamped in the greenhouse.
